answerText: "That's why they got me here!" [or "That's why they brought me here!"][10]  During the offseason, Ernie Grunfeld got Paul Pierce here by signing the veteran to this team as a cheaper replacement for Trevor Ariza. John Wall and Bradley Beal got this team a surprise first-round win over the Bulls.
heading: PADAWAN |2014 | 13 | 6 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: This outburst was caught on microphone after its speaker hit a fadeaway two-pointer over Patrick Patterson to put his team up 7 with a minute to go. [10] Give the enthusiastic six-word sentence that Paul Pierce shouted at the end of Game 7 in the 2014 Nets-Raptors series.
